title: MD, PhD
portraitUrl: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 100 100"><rect width="100" height="100" fill="%23001a4d"/><text x="50" y="50" font-family="serif" font-size="40" fill="%2300aaff" text-anchor="middle" dy=".3em">DL</text></svg>
bio: Dennis Lo is a pioneer in Noninvasive Prenatal Testing at Chinese University of Hong Kong, Hong Kong. With a D-Index of 125 and over 145,000 citations, they are among the world's most influential researchers.
